publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5063 Pauline McNeill: The Scottish Parliament Welcomes Fire Fighters from Nablus—That the Parliament warmly welcomes the firefighters from Nablus who are in Scotland for three weeks to receive fire service training at the Scottish Fire Services College in Gullane, East Lothian; congratulates the Fire Brigades Union, the Scottish Government and the college for organising and supporting the project that exemplifies the fire service as a fraternity that exists across international boundaries, and believes that this type of collaboration with Palestinian public service workers is important in keeping skills up to date and will benefit ordinary citizens living in the occupied Palestinian territories. Supported by: Elaine Smith*

S3M-5063 The Scottish Parliament Welcomes Fire Fighters from Nablus (lodged on 27 October 2009) Marlyn Glen*, Bill Wilson*, Sarah Boyack*, Jackie Baillie*, Jamie Hepburn*, Robin Harper*, Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-5063 The Scottish Parliament Welcomes Fire Fighters from Nablus (lodged on 27 October 2009) Joe FitzPatrick*, Trish Godman*

S3M-5063 Pauline McNeill: The Scottish Parliament Welcomes Fire Fighters from Nablus—That the Parliament warmly welcomes the firefighters from Nablus who are in Scotland for three weeks to receive fire service training at the Scottish Fire Services College in Gullane, East Lothian; congratulates the Fire Brigades Union, the Scottish Government and the college for organising and supporting the project that exemplifies the fire service as a fraternity that exists across international boundaries, and believes that this type of collaboration with Palestinian public service workers is important in keeping skills up to date and will benefit ordinary citizens living in the occupied Palestinian territories. Supported by: Elaine Smith, Marlyn Glen, Bill Wilson, Sarah Boyack, Jackie Baillie, Jamie Hepburn, Robin Harper, Hugh O’Donnell, Joe FitzPatrick, Trish Godman
S3M-5063 The Scottish Parliament Welcomes Fire Fighters from Nablus (lodged on 27 October 2009) Linda Fabiani*
